alert.note: Alert for Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SUMTER...NORTHEASTERN PASCO...SOUTHEASTERN HERNANDO...NORTHWESTERN POLK AND NORTHEASTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM EDT... At 930 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Bushnell to 11 miles northeast of Zephyrhills North to 8 miles northwest of Lakeland. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Auburndale, Bushnell, Combee Settlement, Fussels Corner, Lake Alfred, Ridge Manor, Polk City, Center Hill, Webster, Rockridge, Withla, Tarrytown, Gibsonia, Lacoochee, Croom, The Green Swamp, Kathleen, and Winston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
